title: Big Data Social Analytics in Financial Services
abstract: How is MarkLogic’s Big Data analytical functionality being used in Financial Services for management of information and requirement analysis? What’s happening in world of regulation? What most recent events within the last set of releases from the Financial Authorities will most impact you? In this presentation we will examine how MarkLogic’s Big Data analytics can help you understand your business better.

surveys.comments: Topic was good.  Visual aids were not great and speaker was fair.
Very interesting style - kept attention - a bit more depth on the subject would have been better.
